description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              • Evaluate price analysis for cross-quote feasibility. Co-operate with Purchasing Department to determine which supplier can best meet our target price.
              
              • Identify opportunities and risks in the Production process to improve the production cost.
              
              • Check factory’s consumption, labor cost and provide factory the best way to save cost.
              
              • Communicate closely with Development team and Factory to ensure all development changes and material price changes are reflected in the factory costing sheets correctly.
              
              • Maintain costing summary on development & cost data.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              • Bachelor degree
              
              • Excellent at MS Office.
              
              • Strong technical knowledge of furniture construction and manufacturing methods.
              
              • Fluently in English
              
              • Strong of negotiation skills
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
